Articles.Content: I browsed all the video settings in the menu, but I found nothing to adjust my gamma. Is it possible?

May well be.

If your problem is that you can't see your vessel in the dark, I'd like to point you to the **Ambient Light Adjustment** mod. This works much better than just cranking up gamma.

Cranking up gamma will make your game look awful.

[PlanetShine](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/96497-0-25-1-0-2-PlanetShine-v0-2-3-1) is what you need. It also has some other niche visual effects in vacuum.

I can second PlanetShine. You can either turn the vacuum ambient light up so that you can easily see your vessel on the dark side of a planet, or turn it down to near-zero for more realistic space travel.
